data.title: Jim Carter in Conversation with Rob Brydon
data.meta_description: A proudly local theatre with an international vision and reputation
data.text:
Jim Carter is back! Join us for more fascinating conversations with some of the countryâ€™s most beloved talent from stage and screen.

Rob Brydon will be discussing his extensive career with Jim. Welsh comedian, actor, radio and television presenter, singer and impressionist, Rob is best known for feel-good TV favourites Gavin and Stacey, Would I Lie to You and The Trip.

All proceeds from this special fundraising event are in aid of Kiln Theatre. Your support will help to create innovative productions, to make theatre available to our local community and to connect everyone, whatever their background, through the power of performance. Read more here.

For hospitality packages click here.

Age Guidance 14+
